articles.title: Veteran analyst has blunt message on Intel stock
articles.mainIdea: Veteran analyst has blunt message on Intel stock
articles.summary: TheStreet: Veteran analyst has blunt message on Intel stock. Intel stock is trading approximately 0.52% lower at $36.16 as of the time of writing. The stock is down, due to a Reuters report stating that Nvidia has decided not to manufacture its chips using Intel’s 18A node (manufacturing process) after conducting some testing. In response to this report, an ... Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.

articles.title: Nvidia tested making chips with Intel’s 18A process, but stopped, Reuters says
articles.mainIdea: Nvidia tested making chips with Intel’s 18A process, but stopped, Reuters says
articles.summary: TipRanks: Nvidia tested making chips with Intel’s 18A process, but stopped, Reuters says. While Intel (INTC) is picking up momentum on the deals front, its manufacturing unit has struggled to produce quality in-house chips, according to Reuters, which reports that Nvidia (NVDA) recently tested out whether it would manufacture its chips using Intel’s 18A production process, but stopped moving forward, citing two people familiar with the matter. Nvidia did not answer a request for comment, according to Reuters.Claim 70% Off TipRanks This Holiday SeasonUnlock hedge fund-level data and p Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.
